content:
hey @CraftSpider @Nixon Enraght-Moony I'm about to add a warning when someone changes rustdoc-json-types:

        "src/rustdoc-json-types": {
          "message": "rustdoc-json-types is a **public** (although nightly-only) API. Consider changing `src/librustdoc/json/conversions.rs` instead.",

are one of you interested in getting pinged on those changes to look at the new API? no problem if not, I can put myself as the reviewer instead
this doesn't add anything to the whole /json folder because it would be way too noisy
I'd be interested in being pinged for it
awesome! I'll put you down :) you don't have to be on the hook for reviewing, it's just in case someone not from rustdoc gets assigned
Do we have a list of people using the JSON. I know of https://github.com/Maan2003/druid-rustdoc-frontend, and @HeroicKatora has something, I think.
